title: A Year of change in three children (TEFC)

description: Episode of Series "Cognitive Development". It is not until 5 years old or so that children come to understand the notions of conservation of area, length and weight. This program, recorded at Nottingham primary school, examines the responses of three children to various Piagetian tests over a period of one year.
